charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0100: Did I do something to make you angry, Lycanroc?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0200: If I gave a bad command, I’m sorry...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1101_0300:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived in the
village and looked for the source of the voice.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1101_0400:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] noticed a Lycanroc turning its back 
to Olivia as Olivia apologized to it.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0600:
Well, you saw a bit of an embarrassing scene,
didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0301_0700: You look like you’re in a bit of a jam.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_0800:
We finished battling a Trainer, and now Lycanroc
doesn’t want to look at me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_1000:
We finished battling a Trainer, and now Lycanroc
doesn’t want to look at me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1100: I don’t have a clue... Did I do something bad?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_1300: No. And Lycanroc is my best partner...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_1500: It is. Lycanroc is my best partner...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1600:
I always make sure he’s in tip-top shape so he
can battle whenever, and I make sure to give
careful instructions during battle.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1700:
I go to sleep holding him tight every night,
just like I would with a Stufful plushy.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1800:
I thought I treated him well, so I don’t know
what could have brought this on.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2000: That’s not that weird, is it?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2100: I like cute things just like anybody else!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_2300: I treat him like my own child!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_2400: He’s my pride and joy and can do no wrong!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_2500:
But to be honest, I think he’s just as cute when
he’s ignoring me like this, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_2600:
Of course, I wouldn’t like it if he continued to
ignore me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0301_2700:
You’re paying too much attention
to him.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2800:
Huh? But we’ve always been together,
and we will be from now on, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0302_2900: He might want some alone time.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_3000:
Huh? But we’ve always been together,
and we will be from now on, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3400:
Maybe he needs his alone time because we’ve
spent so much time together.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3500: Maybe that’s what Lycanroc’s been thinking.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3600:
Especially since we’ve been a sync pair here
on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3700:
Lycanroc usually attacks strong opponents,
throwing caution to the wind. 
Isn’t that adorable?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3800:
But because he’s like that, maybe he hasn’t
liked the cautious instructions I’ve been giving.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3900:
It’s true that caring for each other is important in
any trusting relationship, but...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4000:
maybe I should have trusted him more,
even if doing so can be a bit reckless.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4100:
That, in and of itself, might be another form of
trust, after all.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4200: It looks like you’re in a better mood!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4300:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You taught me that there is more than one way
for us to trust one another!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4400: Trust between friends, partners, rivals, family...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4500:
People and Pokémon are really interesting, aren’t
they? This is why I can never get enough of this!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4600:
Lycanroc, let’s use our time on Pasio to build the
perfect relationship to make us even stronger!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4700:
I trust you with my life.
You’re my precious partner, after all!
